snippet.title: ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS Pixel Horror Game Trailer | Documentary Streaming NOW on Discovery+
snippet.description:
ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS is a short pixel horror game based on the documentary by Michael Paul Stephenson streaming exclusively on Discovery+.

PLAY FOR FREE NOW: https://torpledook.itch.io/attack-of-the-murder-hornets

Murder hornets, or the Asian giant hornet, represent an existential threat to North America's honey bee population and thus our food supply.
Learn more about #MurderHornets: 
https://www.discovery.com/dnews/murder-hornets-are-subject-of-upcoming-discovery--documentary-
https://arstechnica.com/science/2021/02/attack-of-the-murder-hornets-is-a-nature-doc-shot-through-horror-sci-fi-lens/

TorpleDook (Hand of Doom, Undiscovered, Chip's Tips) was the lead designer and developer of this playable teaser and I acted as creative director. The project was commissioned and produced by JH Artist Group and director Michael Paul Stephenson.

Watch the documentary on Discovery+: https://www.discoveryplus.com/?xp=dsc_nav_streamnow
Check out TorpleDook's other games: https://torpledook.itch.io/
Play my games: https://airdorf.itch.io/
